item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - SILENT HILL: The Short Message Original Soundtrack / Akira Yamaoka
item.description:
Tracklist:

Disc 1: Whispers Begin

1. From Silence, Whispers Awake (2:10)
2. Unfolding Tales of Hidden Meanings (1:41)
3. Echoes of Time, Guiding Forward (3:08)
4. Words Lurk in Shadows, Speaking Softly (2:17)
5. The Call of the Unknown, Stirring Souls (1:34)
6. Encrypted Dreams, Night's Murmurs (2:04)
7. Beneath Starlit Skies, Secrets Seekers Wander (0:38)
8. On Paths Enshrouded, Mysteries Beckon (0:37)
9. Clues Woven into the Breeze, Leading Astray (2:35)
10. Night's Enigma, Calling Faintly (3:04)
11. Voices Lost, Whispering Across Ages (1:52)
12. A Map in Murmurs, Revealed (0:48)
13. Journey Through Mist, A Beginning (0:56)
14. Under Moonlight, Puzzles Await (2:37)
15. In Gardens of Silence, Quiet Conversations (3:33)
16. Chasing Shadows for Elusive Truths (1:56)
17. The Echo of a Forgotten Melody (1:36)
18. Heart's Language, Deciphered (1:58)
19. Cast by the Unseen, Shadows Lengthen (2:25)
20. Secrets Told on Still Waters (1:12)
21. Quest for the Voice of Silence (2:56)
22. Glimmers of Light in the Dark (1:53)
23. Following Whispers, Path Unveils (2:35)
24. Secrets Unveiled, Beyond the Veil (1:44)
25. Nature's Cipher, Unlocked (2:05)
26. A Message from the Stars, Received (3:26)
27. Awakening of the Inner Voice (1:06)
28. Mysteries' Tapestry, Unraveled (2:18)
29. The Final Clue Before the Dawn (1:44)
30. My Heroine (6:05)

Disc 2: Echoes of Discovery

1. Discovery's First Step, A Whisper
2. Beyond Horizons, Echoes Call
3. The Inner Map Unfolds
4. Trails Illuminated by Starlight
5. From Whispers to Voices, Transformation
6. Visions Guiding the Wayward Heart
7. Riddles of the Soul, Unraveled
8. Wisdom's Echoes, Growing Louder
9. In Ancient Truth's Shadow
10. Light Unveils Hidden Messages
11. Soul's Deep Dive into Self
12. Secrets of Being, Uncovered
13. Worlds Connected by Unseen Bridges
14. Harmonizing the Symphony of Messages
15. Reflections of Truth in Every Heart
16. Understanding Past Whispers
17. A Chorus of Echoes, Uniting
18. The Key to Futures, Found
19. Through Confusion's Storm, A Light
20. Clarity's Light, Breaking Through
21. Carried on Winds of Change, Messages
22. Insight's Dance Begins
23. Harmonizing Truth and Dreams
24. Amplifying the Soul's Voice
25. The Penultimate Revelation Nears
26. The Quest's Culmination
27. My Heroine (Game-Size Version)

Disc 3: Harmony of Revelation

1. Gentle Dawning of Revelation
2. Unity Found in Every Whisper
3. Worlds' Harmony, Revealed
4. Once Veiled Truths, Now Seen
5. Convergence of Echoes and Light
6. Messages Transcending Time's Bound
7. Interpreting the Cosmos' Symphony
8. A World Transformed by Words
9. The Legacy of the Message Endures
10. The Soul's Journey Illuminated
11. Insights Bloom Like Spring Flowers
12. Building Bridges to Understanding
13. Fate's Tapestry, Rewoven
14. Light Cascading Through Doubt
15. Discovering the Essence of Connection
16. Embracing the Universe's Song
17. Wisdom Shared Through Ages
18. Completing the Circle of Messages
19. A Call to Many Hearts
20. The Age of Enlightenment Dawns
21. The Eternal Dance of Messages
22. Interwoven Unity and Diversity
23. Reflecting Upon the Journey
24. The Soul's Narrative, Fulfilled
25. My Heroine (Spanish Version)

© 2024 Konami Music Entertainment. All Rights Reserved
